Title: Fighting around Sudzha sparks concerns about pipeline supplies via Ukraine
Description: Increased fighting activity near Sudzha, Kursk region on the Russian border with Ukraine, which hosts the only operational gas interconnection point between the countries’ gas grids, has sparked market concerns, with prices reaching their highest since late last year.
Author: JS

Title: Altamira FLNG loads first LNG cargo
Description: New Fortress Energy’s, or NFE’s, 1.4 mtpa Altamira Fast LNG floating plant offshore Mexico has loaded its first LNG cargo aboard the Energos Princess LNG tanker, with the vessel expected to depart later today for NFE’s 6 mtpa Barcarena LNG import terminal in Brazil.
Author: JS

Title: Asya Energy becomes the second Russian LNG tanker to spoof AIS signal to circumvent Western sanctions
Description: The Asya Energy LNG tanker has become the latest vessel to spoof its Automatic Identification System, or AIS, signal, following last weekend’s discovery of similar tactics by the Pioneer LNG carrier, which subsequently loaded at Russia’s sanctioned 19.8 mtpa Arctic 2 LNG export project.
Author: JS

Title: Excelerate Energy plans involvement in LNG terminals in Vietnam, Alaska
Description: US floating storage solutions provider Excelerate Energy is considering involvement in two new floating storage regasification unit-based terminals in Alaska and the development of an onshore LNG import facility in Vietnam.
Author: JS
